predicate.note: Frames file for 'maintain' based on survey of initial sentences of big corpus and comparison with 'keep'

example.name: transitive agentive
example.text: We have a long history of *trace* maintaining an open direct-investment policy.

example.name: maintained belief
example.text: Several traders maintained that the Merc's 12-point circuit-breaker aggravated the market slide Oct 13.
example.arg: the Merc's 12-point circuit-breaker aggravated the market slide Oct 13

example.name: with benefactive
example.text: ...*trace* to maintain commercial air service for an estimated 92 communities, often in rural areas.
example.arg: an estimated 92 communities, often in rural areas.
